title: Uchuusen Sagittarius
synopsis: Working for a multi-purpose space agency, Toppy and Rana make friends with Giraffe, a scientist, and go through various adventures in space. The three encounter danger at times, but their friendship always saves them just in the nick of time.
voices: ['Horie, Mitsuko', 'Shimada, Bin', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Shioya, Yoku', 'Okamoto, Maya', 'Nojima, Akio', 'Tsujimura, Mahito', 'Watanabe, Naoko', 'Ginga, Banjou', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto']
staff: [['Saitou, Hiroshi', ['Storyboard']], ["Koorogi '73", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Harada, Hiroshi', ['Key Animation']], ['Matsumi, Shinichi', ['Production Assistant']]]
